title: Glitterz L-3 Nozzlenose
paragraphs: The Glitterz L-3 Nozzlenose is a main weapon in Splatoon 3, and is the Emberz-branded version of the L-3 Nozzlenose. It was added as part of the Splatlands Collection on 12 June 2025.

The Glitterz L-3 Nozzlenose has a similar apperence to the L-3 Nozzlenose but with a noticeable color change. The barrel and the nozzle have changed to a seafoam green and the build around it has changed to a light gray. The hose has changed to a light magenta. An Emberz badge is also added to the side.
The Glitterz L-3 Nozzlenose comes with Splat Bomb and Inkjet.
- Promotional image of the Emberz collection
The word glitterz is a stylized spelling of the word glitters.
